Tanks

Class Tank

  • java.lang.Object
    • Tanks.Tank

  • public class Tank
extends java.lang.Object
    The Tank class represents a tank in the game. It handles the tank's properties, movements, and actions.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Tank(PApplet app, int r, int g, int b, java.awt.Point startPos, java.lang.String name)
      Constructs a Tank object with a specified color.
      Tank(PApplet app, java.awt.Point startPos, java.lang.String name)
      Constructs a Tank object with a default color.

        startPos - The starting position of the tank.
        name - The name of the tank.

      • Tank

        public Tank(PApplet app,
            int r,
            int g,
            int b,
            java.awt.Point startPos,
            java.lang.String name)
        Constructs a Tank object with a specified color.
        Parameters:
        app - The PApplet instance.
        r - The red component of the tank color.
        g - The green component of the tank color.
        b - The blue component of the tank color.
        startPos - The starting position of the tank.
        name - The name of the tank.

    • Method Detail

      • update

        public void update(PApplet app,
                   float deltaTime,
                   int[] terrainHeights)
        Updates the tank's state and position based on gravity and parachute status.
        Parameters:
        app - The PApplet instance.
        deltaTime - The time difference between frames.
        terrainHeights - The heights of the terrain at different x-coordinates.

      • startFalling

        public void startFalling()
        Starts the tank falling, checking and deploying parachutes if available.

      • stopFalling

        public void stopFalling()
        Stops the tank from falling and resets the fall velocity and parachute deployment status.

      • display

        public void display(PApplet app)
        Displays the tank on the screen.
        Parameters:
        app - The PApplet instance used for drawing.

      • displayUI

        public void displayUI(PApplet app,
                      float x,
                      float y)
        Displays the UI elements health, fuel, and power on the screen.
        Parameters:
        app - The PApplet instance used for drawing.
        x - The x-coor for the UI display.
        y - The y-coor for the UI display.

      • move

        public void move(int dx)
        Moves the tank by the specified distance.
        Parameters:
        dx - The distance to move the tank.

      • adjustTurret

        public void adjustTurret(boolean rotateRight)
        Adjusts the turret angle of the tank.
        Parameters:
        rotateRight - True to rotate the turret to the right, false to rotate to the left.

      • adjustPower

        public void adjustPower(int delta)
        Adjusts the firing power of the tank.
        Parameters:
        delta - The amount to adjust the power by.

      • changeColor

        public void changeColor(PApplet app,
                        int r,
                        int g,
                        int b)
        Changes the color of the tank according to congif after initiation.
        Parameters:
        app - The PApplet instance.
        r - The red component of the new color.
        g - The green component of the new color.
        b - The blue component of the new color.
